**** Related Primitives ****
Negative_Sign (_)

      x - y Minus
Rank_0_0 -- operates on individual atoms of x and y, producing a result of the same shape -- WHY_IS_THIS_IMPORTANT?


Subtracts the value of y from x
   0 1 2.2 3j4 4r5 66 - 2
_2 _1 0.2 1j4 _1.2 64
The verb Minus (-) differs from the noun decorator Negative_Sign (_) e.g. as in  2 3 _5 7
The following subtracts the two-element vector 5 7 from the two-element vector 2 3 , returning a pair of negative values
   2 3 -5 7
_3 _4
**** Common Uses ****

Subtraction per the rules of arithmetic.

_5 _5 _99 0 3 7
